column2: select top 1 DF.D_MOBILE_NO as DIFF_MOBILE_NO, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(DF.TRANS_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DIFF_TRANS_DTM , DF.FACE_VALUE as DIFF_AMT, DF.VALIDITY as DIFF_VALIDITY, DF.REF_ID as DIFF_REF_ID, RT.TABLE_NAME as DIFF_TABLE_NAME, AD.ADJUST_BOS_ID  from PMDB..PM_PREPAID_BATCH_RECONCILE_DIFF DF  inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_BATCH_RECONCILE RC on (DF.BATCH_RCC_ID = RC.BATCH_RCC_ID)  inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH BR on (RC.BATCH_ID = BR.BATCH_ID)  inner join PMDB..PM_RECONCILE_MAPPING M on (RC.RECONCILE_ID = M.RECONCILE_ID and M.RECONCILE_CODE = '007') inner join PMDB..PM_RECONCILE_MAPPING_TABLE RT on (M.RECONCILE_ID = RT.RECONCILE_ID)  inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_BATCH_RECONCILE_DIFF_TABLE DT on (DF.DIFF_ID = DT.DIFF_ID and RT.TABLE_ID = DT.TABLE_ID) inner join PMDB..PM_ADJUST_BOS AD on (DF.REF_ID = AD.ADJUST_BOS_ID and (AD.REQUEST_ACTION = 'Deduct Amount' or AD.REQUEST_ACTION = 'Add Amount'))  where BR.ORDER_ID = @order_id
